resources:
EmpoweringTheNation Empowering The Nation Empowering the nation is a company that aims to provide skills training to domestic workers and gardeners. giving them more opportunities to be more marketable and enabling them to earn higher wages or start their own businesses. Six Month Courses R1500 .First Aid
.Sewing
.Landscaping
.Life Skills Six Week Courses R750 .First Aid
.Sewing

.Life Skills View Details View details
//six month course strings//
•Wounds and bleeding
•Burns and fractures
•Emergency scene management 
•Cardio-Pulmonary Resuscitation (CPR)
•Respiratory distress e.g., Choking, blocked airway •Types of stitches
•Threading a sewing machine
•Sewing buttons, zips, hems and seams
•Alterations 
•Designing and sewing new garments •Indigenous and exotic plants and trees 
•Fixed structures (fountains, statues, benches, tables, built-in braai) 
•Balancing of plants and trees in a garden 
•Aesthetics of plant shapes and colours •Opening a bank account
•Basic labour law (know your rights) 
•Basic reading and writing literacy
•Basic numeric literacy //
//six week course strings
•birth to six-month old baby needs 
•seven-month to one year old needs 
•Toddler needs 
•Educational toy
•Water restrictions and the watering requirements of indigenous and exotic plants 
•Pruning and propagation of plants 
•Planting techniques for different plant types
•Nutritional requirements for a healthy body 
•Types of protein, carbohydrates and vegetables • Planning meals 
•Preparation and cooking of meals
//

• +27 112 556 8890
• +27 112 660 5110 Contact_Information 12 gold st, Johannesburg
423 annan st, johannesburg
7854 bree st, johannesburg The SME is an initiative by Precious Radebe to provide skills training for domestic workers and gardeners. Customers (employers or employees) can select from a range of courses available. They can select more than one course. The more courses the customers select the more discount they receive. • One course – no discount
• Two courses – 5% discount
• Three courses – 10% discount
• More than three courses – 15% discount
